abstract: A O Scott reviews Jonathan Lee documentary Paul Goodman Changed My Life.
snippet: “Paul Goodman Changed My Life” is Jonathan Lee’s documentary portrait of the ’60s poet, teacher and social critic, whose name was once a household word.
lead_paragraph: “Paul Goodman Changed My Life” is Jonathan Lee’s documentary portrait of the ’60s poet, teacher and social critic, whose name was once a household word.

headline.main: Gadfly of the ’60s, Getting His Due
